Now quickly summing up what we've learned in 
this lesson. First when you learn new words

connect them with an image. This will 
help you to remember the new words.

Second, don't get scared by the different sounds 
of the English language. Instead, cultivate your

curiosity for them. Don't be afraid of mistakes 
in order to learn. You will make mistakes
all the time, make the most out of them . And lastly, relax about your accent. You
